name: Cek ID PLN PASCA DAN PRA BAYAR
title: Cek ID PLN PASCA DAN PRA BAYAR
tool_name: Cek ID PLN PASCA DAN PRA BAYAR

api_list.name: Get Data ID Pelanggan Tagihan PLN / PASCA BAYAR
api_list.description:
GET Data Pelanggan Tagihan PLN / PLN PASCA BAYAR /Postpaid
- masukan id PLN di form id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://cek-id-pln-pasca-dan-pra-bayar.p.rapidapi.com/pln/532411286263/postpaid"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cek-id-pln-pasca-dan-pra-bayar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://cek-id-pln-pasca-dan-pra-bayar.p.rapidapi.com/pln/{id}/postpaid"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "cek-id-pln-pasca-dan-pra-bayar.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
